title: Vinnie Goodwill on Nets Fiasco, Kyrie Irving Tweets, and NBA Talk
description:
Bomani Jones is joined by Vinnie Goodwill of Yahoo Sports to talk about the Nets firing Steve Nash and hiring Ime Udoka, the Kyrie Irving drama, and a look around the rest of the NBA.
